title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.25 - Approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.25 - Approval

State Regulations

Consistent with provisions of section
337.23
of this Part, the chief
administrative officer may approve such sabbatical leave as he or she deems
appropriate, and such leave shall be reported to the
chancellor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
337.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
